description: This file defines the main UI screen for a story feed in a Flutter app. It includes a StatefulWidget that manages rendering a gradient background, a custom AppBar, a story card that updates based on provider state, swipe actions, animated transitions, and an empty state with reshuffle functionality.

classes.name: FeedScreen
classes.description: Main screen widget that displays a story feed with animations, background, and a floating action button.

classes.name: _FeedScreenState
classes.description: State class for FeedScreen managing initialization, building UI, and handling user interactions.

classes.name: _EmptyState
classes.description: Stateless widget displaying the empty state with 'You're all caught up' message and reshuffle button.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Builds the widget tree for the story feed screen, including background, app bar, story card, and FAB.

methods.name: didChangeDependencies
methods.description: Initializes the feed provider if it has not been initialized yet.

methods.name: _EmptyState
methods.description: Builds the UI for the empty state message when there are no stories.
